doc:
Charles Malik Whitfield https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Malik_Whitfield 0 Charles Malik Whitfield (born August 1, 1972) is an American actor. Whitfield is best known for his performance as Otis Williams in the television miniseries, The Temptations (1998), for which he was nominated for a NAACP Image Award for Outstanding Actor in a Television Movie or Mini-Series. Charles_Malik_Whitfield ( born August_1_,_1972 ) is an_American_actor . Whitfield is_best_known for his_performance as Otis_Williams in the_television_miniseries , The_Temptations ( 1998_) , for which he was_nominated for a_NAACP_Image_Award for Outstanding_Actor in a_Television_Movie_or_Mini-Series .
